user_input: 日系朦朧美，拍女生皮膚白

output.note: Designed for the 'Japanese Airy' aesthetic. HDF ON combined with low Clarity (-3) creates the dreamy 'hazy' effect. High Key (+3) and lifted Shadows (+2) ensure the skin looks fair and porcelain-like by eliminating harsh darks. Negative Film provides the base nostalgic color, while the WB shift (Blue/Magenta direction) counteracts yellow casts to keep skin tones clean.
